Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photo shows Europeans trying to get to North Africa during World War II, when in reality it shows Albanian migrants escaping communist rule in 1991.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the photo by falsely attributing it to a different historical context.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in the claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is contradicted by factual evidence and expert analysis.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the photo depicts Europeans trying to get to North Africa during World War II without verifying the accuracy.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation that the photo shows Albanian migrants escaping communist rule in 1991.
